title: [EPIC] Release Integrity and Truth Baseline
body:
Owner: @team-platform
KPI: Release Gate Completeness = 100% for tagged releases.

Scope:
- Unify release gating across test/security/integration workflows.
- Reconcile status docs so capability/roadmap/GA views do not conflict.
- Make readiness evidence machine-checkable.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Release workflow depends on security + integration smoke + nightly evidence checks.
- [ ] One generated status snapshot is published in CI artifacts.
- [ ] No contradictory GA blocker status across canonical docs.

title: Gate release workflow on security and integration checks
body:
Owner: @team-platform
KPI: 0 releases published without successful security+integration gate.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] `release.yml` requires successful completion of selected `security.yml` and integration suites.
- [ ] Tag build fails when dependency gates are missing.
- [ ] Release run summary lists all upstream gate SHAs.

title: Make npm dependency audit blocking for HIGH/CRITICAL
body:
Owner: @team-risk
KPI: High/Critical npm audit findings merged to main = 0.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Security workflow fails on HIGH/CRITICAL npm vulnerabilities.
- [ ] Warning-only path removed for high-severity findings.
- [ ] Exception mechanism documented with expiration and owner.

title: Add PR integration smoke lane for high-risk paths
body:
Owner: @team-platform
KPI: Escaped regressions from integration/e2e classes <= 2 per month.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] PR workflow runs a bounded integration smoke suite.
- [ ] Smoke suite covers API, streaming, receipts, and one connector path.
- [ ] Runtime budget stays under 15 minutes.

title: Tighten skip-marker governance and burn-down
body:
Owner: @team-platform
KPI: Skip baseline count reduced by >= 30 by milestone close.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] New skips require ticket reference and expiry date.
- [ ] CI fails when baseline increases without approved override.
- [ ] Existing 136 skip baseline has a burn-down plan with owners.

title: Automate capability/GA/status reconciliation report
body:

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] CI job compares `CAPABILITY_MATRIX`, `GA_CHECKLIST`, `ROADMAP`, and `STATUS`.
